outputs.output_descr: The project addresses two activity fields: (i) Strengthening governance through NTS reporting and review, and (ii) Capacity building for road and transport safety. Both are prominent activities that emanate from NTS and assistance and advice by experts is considered important for successfully achieving these tasks

project_descr: MOT is aiming at developing sustainable transport systems and improving road safety. The project addresses two activity fields: (i) Strengthening governance through NTS reporting and review, and (ii) Capacity building for road and transport safety.
